Introduction: Oh, hey! You're that new farmer guy!$h^Oh, hey! You're that new farmer lady!$h#$e#See you around!$h
springArchaeologyHouse: Ugh, I just want to read the end of the book already!#$b#It's driving me crazy not knowing who the killer is!#$e#...Is Jacob asleep?
summerArchaeologyHouse: I'm obsessed with this Sango character. She deserves way better than that Miroku guy.
fallArchaeologyHouse: This week we're reading a book from my childhood.#$b#Unfortunately, it's not as good as I remember it being.#$b#Still, it's nostalgic to read this again.
winterArchaeologyHouse: See the art in this book? I drew that.#$b#Not my best work.$s#$b#Also, this book is actually kind of interesting as you get into it.
spring_3_1: We're meeting this Saturday at Haley's house to celebrate my birthday.#$b#I'd love to have you stop by!$h#$e#I know it's not REALLY my birthday, but the date works for everyone.#$b#Busy schedules, and all that jazz.
spring_14_1: I ate way too many eggs yesterday.$s#$b#I think I need to lie down.$s
spring_Mon: There's @!$h#$e#You can't spell 'neighbor' without '@'!$h#$e#That's not true.#$e#I lied.
spring_Tue: I keep buying too many art supplies.$s#$b#I can't afford to keep doing that!#$e#Guess I'm eating ramen again tonight.$s#$e#It'll be so worth it, though.
spring_Wed: I swear, I can't find a single bathroom around here.#$b#Does everyone just go in the woods in this town?
spring_Thu: Howdy, @!$h#$e#Yeehaw, motherfricker!$h#$e#I feel like that was too vulgar.#$e#Whoops.
spring_Fri: I'm kind of loving everything about your outfit today.#$b#Like, hell yeah!$h#$b#Serving %farm Farm realness.#$e#That sounded like something Kurtis would say.
spring_Sat: Whenever I go to take out the trash, I feel like the trash bin's been tampered with.#$b#Must be raccoons.#$e#Maybe if I go out at night, I can catch them in the act.
spring_Sun: Haley and I are kinda besties.#$b#We met in college.#$b#Do you have any friends like that?
summer_Mon: Hey, loser.$h#$e#Sorry, that was mean.#$e#I meant it in a friendly way.
summer_Tue: Boys should wear skirts more.#$e#I said what I said, and I stand by it.
summer_Wed: I trust Harvey as a doctor.#$b#There are like 12 people living in this town.#$b#There's NO WAY that man became a doctor here to make money.#$e#He must really love helping people.
summer_Thu: This is perfect weather for some ice cream.#$e#Who doesn't like ice cream?#$e#...#$b#Can you go get me some?
summer_Fri: I wish my name was @.#$b#That's a powerful name.#$b#Big protagonist energy.
summer_Sat: Leah and I have plans to drink wine and paint paintings!#$b#Ooh! I should invite Shelby, too!$h#$e#I'm so frigging excited.$h
summer_Sun: This town could really use a bakery.#$e#Chocolate croissants? Cakes?! Doughnuts?!$h#$b#Maybe I should make one.#$e#Baker Ana.#$b#That could be me!$h
fall_Mon: Embarrassing memories from my past.$s#$b#They follow me wherever I go.$s#$e#It friggin' sucks.$s
fall_Tue: Let me give you some advice, kid.#$b#Never trust a cellist.
fall_Wed: Why did you call it %farm Farm?#$b#Wait! Don't tell me.#$b#It's a family name, isn't it?
fall_Thu: Sometimes I get nervous in social situations.$s#$b#Talking to you isn't so bad, though.
fall_Sat: Don't you hate it when you're reading a fanfiction and the voice of the characters doesn't match their original personalities?#$e#You know what I'm talking about, right?
fall_Sun: How hard can chopping down trees be?#$b#Give me an ax! I'll chop down the whole forest by sundown!$h
winter_Mon: My brother Jacob can be such a doof.#$b#He e-mailed me "Check this out!" and attached the Shrek 2 soundtrack.#$e#Full of beans, he is.
winter_Tue: Hey @.#$e#How dare you approach me and expect me to talk back to you.#$e#Do you think this is how conversations work?#$b#Do you think you can just demand words out of me?#$e#Nay, I say.#$b#I refuse.#$e#Begone!
winter_Wed: I wanna prepare some cookie dough and just like...#$b#eat the dough.#$e#Whelp. I know my plans for tonight.
winter_Thu: I really look up to Robin.#$b#She's the carpenter girlboss that I want to be.
winter_Fri: I'm gonna bake cookies with Shelby later.#$b#I'm SO FRIGGIN EXCITED!$h#$e#Snickerdoodles are where it's at, @.
winter_Sat: Hey, @.#$b#Did you brush your teeth today?
winter_Sun: %She goes in for a high five. You raise your hand. She misses your hand.
